meanings.definition: Belonging to or associated with them.
meanings.sent2: Theirs is the biggest house on the block.
meanings.sent3: Theirs is a magical garden where flowers never wilt.
meanings.sent4: Theirs is a kingdom of dreams and wonder.
meanings.sent5: Theirs is a treasure trove of memories and joy.

meanings.definition: Used to refer to a group of people or things previously mentioned.
meanings.sent1: Theirs are the books on the top shelf.
meanings.sent2: The teacher praised theirs for their hard work.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, theirs brought the silliest hats.
meanings.sent4: In the game, theirs were the knights in shining armor.
meanings.sent5: During the party, theirs danced under the stars.
